name: Path of Blood
description: This path focuses on the manipulation of Kindred vitae. It allows the thaumaturge to test the blood for properties such as how much vitae remains, approximate Generation, and whether the subject has committed diablerie.

name: Elemental Mastery
description: This path allows a vampire limited control over and communion with inanimate objects. It can draw upon the strength and resilience of the earth or objects around him to increase his physical prowess without the need for large amounts of blood.

name: Movement of the Mind
description: This path allows the thaumaturge to manipulate and move objects with the power of her mind, including lifting, pushing, and manipulating items from a distance.

name: Lure of Flames
description: This path grants the thaumaturge the power to conjure and control fire. The intensity and area of the flame depend on the thaumaturge's mastery of the path.

name: Weather Control
description: Command over the weather, allowing the thaumaturge to create phenomena such as fog, rain, high winds, and even lightning strikes.

name: The Green Path
description: This path grants the thaumaturge power over plants, allowing her to command and influence vegetation to do her bidding.

name: The Path of Conjuring
description: This path allows the thaumaturge to create temporary objects and creatures out of thin air. The complexity and durability of these creations depend on the thaumaturge's mastery of the path.

name: Hands of Destruction
description: A path that allows the thaumaturge to dissolve and decay objects and beings with a touch, causing them to break down and disintegrate.

name: Neptune's Might
description: This path grants the thaumaturge power over water, enabling her to manipulate and control it, ranging from small quantities to large bodies of water.

name: Path of Mars
description: A path that enhances the thaumaturge's abilities as a warrior, granting increased physical prowess and combat capabilities.

name: Technomancy
description: A relatively recent path that focuses on the control of electronic devices, allowing the thaumaturge to interface with and manipulate technology.

name: Path of Corruption
description: This path allows the thaumaturge to manipulate and corrupt the morals and ethics of her victims, leading them to depravity and moral decay.

name: Path of the Father's Vengeance
description: A specialized path that inflicts the darkness of the Angel of Death upon the subject, causing excruciating pain in the presence of light.

name: Animalism
description: Supernatural affinity with and control of animals.

name: Auspex
description: Extrasensory perception, awareness and premonitions.

name: Celerity
description: Supernatural quickness and reflexes.

name: Chimerstry
description: The ability to create illusions and hallucinations.

name: Dementation
description: The ability to inflict madness upon a victim.

name: Dominate
description: Mind control practiced through the piercing gaze.

name: Fortitude
description: Unearthly toughness, even to the point of resisting fire and sunlight.

name: Necromancy
description: The supernatural power to summon and control the dead.

name: Obfuscate
description: The ability to remain obscure and unseen, even in crowds.

name: Obtenebration
description: Unearthly control over shadows.

name: Potence
description: The Discipline of physical vigor and strength.

name: Presence
description: The ability to attract, sway and control crowds.

name: Protean
description: Shapechanging, from growing claws to melding with the earth.

name: Quietus
description: The art of assassination.

name: Serpentis
description: The Discipline of reptilian powers.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: The study and practice of blood sorcery.

name: Vicissitude
description: The art of flesh-shaping.
